dbs

Class DB

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbs.DB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DBI, java.rmi.Remote

    public class DB
extends java.lang.Object
implements DBI
    A class containing all the database calls
    Version:
    0.2 26/06/2017
    Author:
    Stefan-Daniel Horvath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DB()
      No argument constructor, a connection to the postgresql server is established.

                                  int auditorium_id,
                                  int cinema_id,
                                  int row,
                                  int col)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        If exists, returns the reservations with the parameter start, auditorium_id, cinema_id, row and col from the database.
        Specified by:
        getReservation in interface DBI
        Parameters:
        start - a LocalDateTime time that represents the start of a projection
        auditorium_id - the id of the auditorium in which the projection will start
        cinema_id - the id of the cinema in which the projection will start
        row - the row of a reserved seat
        col - the col of a reserved seat
        Returns:
        the reservation with the requested parameters or null
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
